title: Valentin Bernadsky's Painting 2008
description:

BIOGRAPHY

(1917 - 2011)

BERNADSKY Valentin Danilovich.
Born in Ozeryane, Chernigov pr., Ukraine in 1917.

Studied at INSTITUTE OF PAINTING, SCULPTURE AND ARCHITECTURE/REPIN ART INSTITUTE 1940-50.

Member of the USSR Union of Arttists. People's Artist of Ukraine and Russia.

Began exhibiting 1952.
Active in Sympheropol, Crimea/ Taught at Sympheropl Art College 1950-52.

Represented in numerous major national museums and private collections worldwide.


 
http://www.russianartgallery.com/artist/Valentin-Bernadsky/
